title: Replay system that won't get me banned
body:
I am seeing a lot of third party software leading to bans.

I have recently become interested in acquiring a replay system... I tried Lolreplay but it was buggy as hell so I am looking for an alternative but am scared I could get perma banned. I found someting called "LoL summoner information" but it looks like it has a bunch of bells and whistles that may be considered banworthy.

All I want is a replay system, I don't care about anything else. Is there one approved of by Riot?

replies.body: replay.gg. you sign up first and when u wanna watch a replay, you go to that website again. Sign in and pick the replay, then copy/paste the thing it gives you  into your command prompt with the lol client open and boom. it uses lol's spectator mode for replays
You're not going to get banned for using LSI, there is also OP.GG recorder, Baron replays, OBS, Fraps, and overwolfs instant replay system.

> [{quoted}](name=Raith alghul,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EQng5i1J,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-17T01:31:06.052+0000)
>
> You're not going to get banned for using LSI, there is also OP.GG recorder, Baron replays, OBS, Fraps, and overwolfs instant replay system.

Whoa, slow down there.

Ok so you're sure I won't get banned for using LSI? positive? it looks like it has extra stuff which worries me terribly.... but I'll trust you....  now if SkinSpotlight Replay fails, I have another option.

I'll check out OP.GG recorder if LSI fails for whatever... thanks by the way.
I use LSI, not any of the overlay features I only use it to record replays, but it has been approved by Riot and the devs remove any features if Riot asks them.
